meanings.definition: Relating to or involving both mechanical and chemical processes.
meanings.sent1: The mechanochemical process involves both mechanical and chemical actions.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the mechanochemical properties of the new material.
meanings.sent3: The mechanochemical reaction between the gears and the oil created a surprising result.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to problem-solving was mechanochemical, combining physical effort with chemical knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The mechanochemical bond between the two elements was incredibly strong.

meanings.definition: A process or reaction that combines mechanical and chemical actions.
meanings.sent1: The mechanochemical in the lab was used to mix the compounds effectively.
meanings.sent2: The mechanochemical of the engine helped convert fuel into energy.
meanings.sent3: The mechanochemical in the factory was a fascinating sight to observe.
meanings.sent4: The mechanochemical of the clockwork mechanism was intricate and precise.
meanings.sent5: The mechanochemical of the experiment produced remarkable results.
